result.title: Issues with problem "2B — The least round way"
result.content: The code I posted below perfectly work on Mac as well as Ubuntu (GNU GCC 4.9.2) but when I submitted to test, always received the result "wrong on test 1" with weird behaviors: strange extra character at start of strings "�DDRR" My code goes here Could anyone tell me the reason and how to fix that? thanks a ton.
